00013 void BdkBinWgtList::setI(const BdkTriBin & bin) {
00014   _i.setBin(&bin);
00015 
00016   switch(_op) {
00017   case BdkIsoOp::P32: _i.setWeight(1./sqrt(6.)); break;
00018   case BdkIsoOp::P22: _i.setWeight(0.5); break;
00019   case BdkIsoOp::P12: _i.setWeight(3./sqrt(44.)); break;
00020   case BdkIsoOp::P21: _i.setWeight(1./sqrt(12.)); break;
00021   case BdkIsoOp::P11: _i.setWeight(0.5); break;
00022   case BdkIsoOp::P01: _i.setWeight(1./sqrt(6.)); break;
00023   case BdkIsoOp::P10: _i.setWeight(1./sqrt(2.)); break;
00024   }
00025 }

00103 const BdkBinWgt & BdkBinWgtList::binWgt(int op) const {
00104   switch(op) {
00105   case BdkSymOp::I: return _i;
00106   case BdkSymOp::R: return _r;
00107   case BdkSymOp::RR: return _rr;
00108   case BdkSymOp::E: return _e;
00109   case BdkSymOp::ER: return _er;
00110   case BdkSymOp::ERR: return _err;
00111   default: assert(0);
00112   }
00113 }
00114 
00115 const BdkBinWgt * BdkBinWgtList::binWgt(const BdkTriBin & bin) const {
00116   // Find the binWgt that points to bin:
00117   for (int op = 0; op < BdkSymOp::NOPS; ++op) {
00118     const BdkBinWgt & bw = binWgt(op);
00119     if (bw.bin() == &bin) {
00120       return &bw;
00121     }
00122   }
00123   return 0;
00124 }
